audience.description: Audience specifies the audience claim used for generating ID token.

project.description: Project is the project telemetry is sent to if the gcp.project.id resource attribute is not set. If unspecified, this is determined using application default credentials.

quota_project.description: QuotaProject specifies a project for quota and billing purposes. The caller must have serviceusage.services.use permission on the project. For more information please read: https://cloud.google.com/apis/docs/system-parameters

scopes.description: Scope specifies optional requested permissions. See https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc6749#section-3.3

token_type.description: TokenType specifies which type of token will be generated. default: access_token
